headline: Jim Cramer Says Apollo Global is “Real Well Run”
summary: Apollo Global Management, Inc. (NYSE:APO) is one of the 14 stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. A caller asked about the company, and Cramer replied, “I think Apollo’s real good. It’s real well run. Marc Rowan is very, very smart.” Apollo Global (NYSE:APO) is an investment firm that deploys capital across private equity, credit, real […]

headline: Why Vanguard, Champion of Low-Fee Investing, Joined the ‘Private Markets’ Craze
summary: Traditional money managers, after years of cutting fees, look to tap in to higher-cost private investments.
